metadata.title: CVE-2017-9038 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.description: GNU Binutils 2.28 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service(heap-based buffer over-read and application crash) via a crafted ELF file,related to the byte_get_little_endian function in elfcomm.c, theget_unwind_section_word function in readelf.c, and ARM unwind informationthat contains invalid word offsets.

criterions.comment: binutils: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
